stays.title: The St. Regis Mumbai

rooms.name: Room, 1 King Bed, View (Grand Deluxe, eco)

stays.map: 462 Senapati Bapat Marg, Lower Parel, Mumbai, Maharashtra, 400013

aboutArea.title: About this area
aboutArea.desc: Located in Lower Parel neighborhood, The St. Regis Mumbai is connected to a shopping center. Shree Siddhivinayak Ganapati Temple and Haji Ali Dargah are notable landmarks, and travelers looking to shop may want to visit High Street Phoenix Mall. Looking to enjoy an event or a game while in town? See what's going on at MMRDA Grounds.

aboutProperty.title: The St. Regis Mumbai
aboutProperty.subTitle: 5-star luxury hotel in the heart of Lower Parel
aboutProperty.desc: Consider a stay at The St. Regis Mumbai and take advantage of a nightclub, a poolside bar, and a grocery/convenience store. Treat yourself to a deep-tissue massage, Ayurvedic treatments, or reflexology at Iridium Spa, the onsite spa. Be sure to enjoy a meal at any of the 8 onsite restaurants, which feature international cuisine and garden views. Pilates classes are offered at the 24-hour gym;

aboutArea.title: About this area
aboutArea.desc: Located in Pune, Conrad Pune by Hilton is in the business district and near the airport. Tribal Museum and Raja Dinkar Kelkar Museum are cultural highlights, and some of the area's landmarks include Muttha Towers and Shaniwar Wada. Bund Garden and ABC farms are also worth visiting.

aboutProperty.title: Conrad Pune by Hilton
aboutProperty.subTitle: 5-star luxury hotel in the business district, rejuvenated in 2016
aboutProperty.desc: At Conrad Pune by Hilton, you can look forward to a nightclub, a roundtrip airport shuttle, and a poolside bar. Treat yourself to a body scrub, a massage, or a body treatment at the onsite spa. Be sure to enjoy a meal at any of the 6 onsite restaurants, which feature international cuisine and a poolside location. In-room WiFi (surcharge) is available to all guests, along with a grocery/convenience store and a rooftop terrace.

aboutProperty.title: Hyatt Regency Pune & Residences

Free in-room WiFi is available to all guests, along with babysitting and a steam room.
